Nerangs.ab: va aṣ̌əm guftan sar-e ān biḫ-e urwarān boridan vohū guftan wa kārd bar miyān-e ān nahādan vahištəm guftan ān biḫ-e urwarān boridan astī uštā astī uštā ahmāi hiiat̰ aṣ̌āi vahištāi aṣ̌əm urvarān čidan hič vāǧ gīrešni-ye digar nadārad wa urvarān pāre pāre kardan dar urvarāndān nahādan va dar yazešgāh bordan moḥkam kardan

"He should say aṣ̌əm and cut the end of the urvarān-branch. He should say vohū and put the knife on the middle of it (the branch). He should say vahištəm and cut the urvarān-branch. During astī uštā astī uštā ahmāi hiiat̰ aṣ̌āi vahištāi, he should tear it off. There is no other wāz to take. He should cut in pieces the urvarān, put it on the urwarāndān, bring it to the yazešgāh and deposite it."
ašem sar-e urvarām čidan va be vohi kārd andar miyān nahādan va be vahištem čidan va asti uštā tā ǧāy goftan va andar urvarāmdān nahādan
"At aṣ̌əm, he should cut the top of the urvarām; at vohū, he should put the knife on the middle; at vahištəm, he should cut and recite astī uštā until the end and put (the pieces) in the urvarāmdān.
